doc.title: Idam mahkumu
doc.plot: The car service owner Ayhan is a brave and honest man. He also is a good husband and father. The dancer Leyla comes to the service to have her car fixed and starts an affair with him. Eventually Ayhan leaves his family. Leyla gets shot, just as Ayhan's wife Nermin comes to visit her, she finds a note on which four names are written. Nermin gets arrested, she gives the note to Ayhan and he begins a search, only one of the names, the night club owner Murat is under suspicion, since all the others have their alibi. Ayhan becomes Murat's driver, opens his vault and finds the evidence of murder, the knife. Murat's men capture him yet he tells everything to Meral, the club's singer. Nermin gets released and they go on with their happy family life.
